tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: HD101 Online is the smartest way to go! You have an assignment, discussion, and quiz/test due every other week. As long as you have read your chapters and do your work, there is no way you won\'t receive an A in here. Only required about 3 hours a week of work. Definitely take this!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Three papers, three tests, and three discussion sections. Not too bad just super time consuming. I wouldn\'t take for an easy A I just needed it to fill writing course. She doesn\'t really help with feedback. I asked multiple times if what I was doing was right and she would only say "Ok" or "Yeah". Class isn\'t that bad just a lot of time put into it

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Dr. Allen\'s lectures were very confusing and she wasn\'t able to explain things in a way that the class understood. She missed several lab sessions and we were taught by a TA who wasn\'t very much help either. The tests weren\'t too tough; however, you have to teach yourself the entire semester.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Professor Allen could be sometimes confusing and all over the place with her lectures so it was hard for me since math is not my best subject. However, she is so nice and helpful. She responds to emails very soon and is very willing to help students outside of class so that they will do well. I did have to study a lot for tests and quizzes matter.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: She is very timely about answering emails. Everything is clearly explained in Blackboard, and the class itself could honestly be finished in one day. I split it into 3 sections and was done after 3 weekends of taking time to take the quizzes. You need the book to do the assignments. Seriously you\'d have to try hard to fail this!!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: She is so sweet, and her class is ridiculously easy. I got an A without taking notes or buying the book, so don\'t even bother buying the book. I\'m serious.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Dr. Allen is a wonderful teacher! She knows the material and makes the class interesting. She tells when quizzes are and whats covered on them. She is more than willing to help those who help themselves. If you get the opportunity, TAKE HER!!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mrs. Allen was a fantastic teacher. She knows the material very well and if you take good notes during lecture you will do fine on the tests. They are straight forward from the notes and the material is not difficult at all. She tells you when the quizzes will be and exactly what is on them so the are an easy 100. TAKE HER CLASS!!!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Dr. Allen is a really sweet teacher. She will try to help you if you are having trouble but usually gives most of her work to her TA to grade and tutor. This is a fairly easy class if you review before the test. The hw quizzes can be hard but she gives lots of bonus and the projects aren\'t too bad either. Over all this is an easy A class

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Mrs. Allen is a great teacher. There were 5 quizzes with the lowest dropped, a paper that was not too bad and was an EASY A, two tests, and the final. She gives a lot of info but her study guide helps. I\'m pretty sure she is one of the best for 101. TAKE HER!!! But you do have to go to class, and she gives extra credit on certain days!
